1. City Council

City Council
============

6:30 p.m.  |  2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month
Bulverde City Hall (30360 Cougar Bend, Bulverde, TX 78163)
View the
[City Calendar](https://bulverdetx.gov/calendar.aspx)
for the most up-to-date meeting schedule.

[City Council Meeting Information](http://tx-bulverde.civicplus.com/257/City-Meeting-Information)

* [Helen Hays](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Mayor-Helen-Hays-51)
  , Mayor | Term Expires May 2028
* [Jason Krawietz](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Jason-Krawietz-48)
  , Council Member Place 1 | Term Expires May 2028
* [Francesca Watson](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Francesca-Watson-46)
  , Council Member Place 2 | Term Expires May 2028
* [Ted Hawkins](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Ted-Hawkins-47)
  , Council Member Place 3 | Term Expires May 2026
* [Clint Hays](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Clint-Hays-49)
  , Council Member Place 4 | Term Expires May 2026
* [Joe Alexandre](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Joe-Alexandre-50)
  , Council Member Place 5 | Term Expires May 2027
* [Christopher Goth](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Christopher-Goth-53)
  , Council Member Place 6 | Term Expires May 2027

To contact a member of the City Council, please click on their respective name above. To contact
members of the City Council,
please click here
.

The City Council of Bulverde is comprised of a Mayor and 6 Council members elected at-large.
Council may meet earlier than the regular scheduled meetings if there is an Executive Session scheduled. The Council may hold a Special Meeting so long as it complies with the Texas Open Meetings Act.
